Type.Name: ChildrenChangedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ChildrenChangedHandler(object o, ChildrenChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ChildrenChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ChildrenChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ChildrenChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ChildrenChangedHandler is removed from the event.
